translation.en: NETFLIX PRESENTS
I miss her.
We were always there for each other
in the most important moments.
The war between our families will be bloody.
translation.es: La guerra entre las familias será sangrienta.

translation.en: And no one will emerge victorious from it.
Lots of bad things have happened,
but it would be good for us to forget about this, uh…
unfortunate incident.
Unfortunate incident?
Oh, excuse me.
I should have said, after this tragedy.
translation.es: Debí haber dicho: Después de esta tragedia.

translation.en: She wouldn't be happy… seeing you crying.
Look, I'll tell you one time, and I won't say it again.
translation.es: Te lo diré una vez y no lo repetiré.

translation.en: This is Sicily. It's my territory.
You will never step a foot in here again.
I will make sure of it.
If you break the rule,
I will turn your ridiculous island into a graveyard.
translation.es: convertiré tu isla en un cementerio.

translation.en: Tell them to get the fuck out of here. Now.
translation.es: Diles que se larguen de una buena vez.

translation.en: Take your dog…
and leave.
You have one hour.
One.
I had something to do.
All right, I'm coming.
I've missed you so much.
It's too soon.
The doctor said that it's too soon.
translation.es: El médico dijo que era muy pronto.

translation.en: I don't care what the doctor said.
translation.es: No me importa lo que haya dicho.

translation.en: Baby…
I know how I feel, and I know what I need.
translation.es: Sé cómo me siento y qué necesito.

translation.en: And it's definitely not lying in a bed and feeling sorry for myself.
translation.es: No quedarme en la cama ni sentir lástima por mí misma.

translation.en: Bang, bang!
No way! Look at you!
You made it downstairs!
But shouldn't you be resting?
What is it with you and resting?
translation.es: ¿Por qué insistes tanto en que descanse?

translation.en: I've had enough rest to last me a lifetime.
translation.es: Ya descansé más de lo necesario.

translation.en: I'm tired of lying in bed and having you baby me.
translation.es: Me harté de estar acostada y de que me cuides tanto.

translation.en: Raquel, please bring us a bottle of wine.
translation.es: Raquel, tráenos una botella de vino, por favor.

translation.en: That's hardcore. It's not even 11:00 yet.
That's bad, even for me.
translation.es: Incluso a mí me parece inusual.

translation.en: Need I remind you that you almost died?
- Getting drunk at breakfast is a bad idea. - For fuck's sake.
translation.es: - Embriagarse al desayuno no es bueno. - ¡Por Dios!

translation.en: Why does everyone suddenly think they know what I need?
translation.es: ¿Por qué todos creen saber qué quiero y qué necesito?

translation.en: Do you have any idea what we've been through?
- Thank you. -
I've never been so afraid of losing you.
And Massimo…
…his heart nearly broke.
Olo, I know how hard it was for you and I know you're worried about me,
translation.es: Olga, sé que fue duro para ti y que te preocupabas por mí,

translation.en: but I've been given a second chance.
I want to make the most of it.
Besides, we haven't even toasted to you changing your mind about marriage.
translation.es: Además, no hemos brindado porque al fin crees en el matrimonio.

translation.en: What?
Nothing.
I'm just happy you're here.
More, more, more alcohol.
I can't look at that hair sober.
translation.es: Sobria no puedo verte el pelo así.

translation.en: Uh, hello, Giuseppe? Can we fix hair today?
translation.es: Hola. ¿Giuseppe? ¿Tienes citas en la peluquería hoy?

translation.en: Right now? Okay. Let's go. Let's go.
Yeah, we're coming!
Of course. Bye. See you!
You have a meeting.
I'm so sorry.
I didn't wanna disturb you.
Could you come and see me when you're done?
Excuse me.
- Be quiet. -
I'm cumming. I'm cumming.
They are waiting for me.
Wow. So you're ready to go, then.
You just had sex.
And what makes you say that? You're not wearing any panties.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué lo dices? - No llevas bragas.

translation.en: But that's not the only thing.
Your hair…
translation.es: Se te nota en el cabello.

translation.en: and your lipstick.
So what? We bumped into each other-- And I fucked him.
translation.es: - Nos encontramos… - Y me lo cogí.

translation.en: Yes, I fucked him.
Listen, I want to hear every kinky little detail, got it?
translation.es: Quiero que me lo cuentes con pelos y señales.

translation.en: Quit smirking and come help me, or we'll never get out the door.
translation.es: Deja de sonreír y ayúdame. A este ritmo, no nos iremos nunca.

translation.en: I've already got everything picked out. Here.
translation.es: Ya te alisté todo. Aquí tienes.

translation.en: This one?
- Or this one? - The black one.
- Hey! Stop! - Tell me everything.
Lari!
Did you tell Massimo we were going out?
Obviously… not!
He doesn't tell me when he goes out. Fuck. Well, this is gonna be interesting!
translation.es: - Él no me dice cuándo sale. - ¡Mierda! Esto va a estar interesante.

translation.en: - Come on, really? This place? - What's the big deal?
translation.es: ¿De verdad? ¿Aquí? ¿Y qué? Los Torricelli son dueños de los restaurantes buenos.

translation.en: All the good restaurants in town belong to the Torricellis.
translation.es: ¿Y qué? Los Torricelli son dueños de los restaurantes buenos.

translation.en: Let's go.
Now, that's what I call a food baby.
translation.es: Comí tanto que me salió panza de embarazada.

translation.en: Well, just more to love.
translation.es: Olga, así tienen más para agarrar.

translation.en: Hello?
Hi, Busy Bee.
Wait a second, please.
Where did you get my number?
You know… I am who I am.
You know my roots.
So… how are you?
Why are you calling?
'Cause… I can't forget about you.
So, try harder.
Who was that?
- How was everything? - Great. Thanks.
Tell me the truth.
Olo, sometimes the truth is complicated.
translation.es: A veces, la verdad no es fácil.

translation.en: Lari, what happened on that island?
- He was just different. - Who?
Nacho.
I ran away with him after Massimo cheated with Anna.
translation.es: Hui con él cuando Massimo me engañó con Anna.

translation.en: Hold on. I thought that was a plot against Massimo.
translation.es: Un momento. Pensé que era un plan contra Massimo.

translation.en: It was, but I didn't know it at the time.
translation.es: Sí, pero yo no lo sabía entonces.

translation.en: Nacho was like my… best friend.
Seriously? You saw the guy twice, and now he's your best friend?
translation.es: ¿Lo habías visto dos veces y ya era tu mejor amigo?

translation.en: Whatever. I'm not here to lecture you.
translation.es: Bueno, no estoy aquí para sermonearte.

translation.en: Sure sounds like it.
Did you sleep with him?
No.
But he was there for me when my whole world was falling apart.
translation.es: Pero me apoyó cuando todo se derrumbaba.

translation.en: He took care of me, and I felt free.
Okay.
I have to forget about him.
Oh my God.
You're in love with him.
Don't be ridiculous. He's just some guy.
translation.es: Déjate de tonterías. No me importa.

translation.en: Okay, come on.
We're going dancing.
- Just vibe on my danger… - Since when do you go out without me?
Since I was 18.
Have you danced yet?
Oh, yeah.
A little, before Domenico almost killed Olga with his tongue.
translation.es: Un poco. Antes de que Domenico casi ahogara a Olga con la lengua.

translation.en: Leave.
Stay.
Leave.
Why don't you sleep?
I can't without you.
I can't without you.
What happened on the island?
Baby, I think that you are drunk, and, um…
Maybe we can talk about this another time?
Answer me!
You'd like to know what happened? Your ex shot me.
What happened between you and Matos?
Nothing happened.
Liar.
You ran away with him when you thought that I was cheating on you with Anna.
translation.es: ¡Huiste con él cuando pensaste que te engañaba con Anna!

translation.en: It would've never happened if you'd told me about your twin brother!
translation.es: No habría pasado si me hubieras contado de tu gemelo.

translation.en: My twin brother?
That twin brother that told me that you were pregnant?
translation.es: ¿El que me contó que estabas embarazada?

translation.en: I wanted to protect the family, and I knew what you would do
translation.es: Quería proteger a la familia. Sabía lo que habrías hecho

translation.en: if you found out that I'd lost the baby in the accident.
translation.es: si supieras que perdí el bebé en el accidente.

translation.en: I didn't want to be the cause of another war.
You had no right…
no right to hide it from me.
It was my baby.
It was our baby, who died because of your enemies.
translation.es: Era nuestro bebé. Murió por culpa de tus enemigos.

translation.en: Because of me.
Wait a moment.
I have to clean.
My God, you're so wet.
What's wrong?
I think I have a hangover.
Hangover?
No.
I think you're hiding something from me.
Sorry, maestro.
Rematch later?
Yeah?
What do you mean?
What?
And you're just telling me this now?
No. Fix this today. I don't give a shit.
translation.es: No. Soluciona este problema hoy. Me importa un comino.

translation.en: Massimo, what's wrong?
Giuseppe fucked up, as usual.
I've known you my entire life.
translation.es: Te conozco de toda la vida.

translation.en: These kinds of things never get to you.
Either you're getting old, or something else is up.
translation.es: Te estás volviendo viejo, o algo más te molesta.

translation.en: - Tommy. - Yeah?
I'm out.
Emi, hi.
I will be in the atelier today. Please expect me.
translation.es: Iré al taller más tarde. Espérame allí.

translation.en: Thank you.
Hey! Why the hell are you in such a hurry?
translation.es: Oye. ¿Me puedes explicar cuál es la prisa?

translation.en: My marriage is falling apart, so I'm focusing on my career. Now, come on!
translation.es: Olga, mi matrimonio se desmorona, así que me enfoco en mi carrera. Vamos.

translation.en: That's great, but do we really have to walk this much?
translation.es: Genial. Pero ¿tienes que ir a pie?

translation.en: I'm so over this.
- I like those colors. - I know, but that's too fancy.
translation.es: - Me gustan esos colores. - Pero es muy elaborado.

translation.en: - Yeah, it's too much. - Yes.
That's Michele, but he's very moody.
translation.es: Ese es Michelle, pero es malhumorado.

translation.en: Very.
Laura, do you realize how much work we still have?
Yeah, and this is so perfect because, you know, I will keep my head busy.
translation.es: Sí, y esto es perfecto porque me va a mantener ocupada.

translation.en: Check this out.
- The first one. - It's great.
It has wide sleeves.
Got it! What about this one?
Hi!
Hiya, Mama Klara!
I'm getting married!
translation.es: - Sí, ¡me voy a casar! - Bueno, mamá…

translation.en: - Okay, Mom… - Really? Congratulations!
- Like the dress? - I'll call later.
Beautiful!
- My little… - I'll call you. Bye. Love you.
Kisses. Bye.
- Bye! - Bye!
That was nice.
The photographer needs to be tall and handsome.
translation.es: El fotógrafo debe ser alto y apuesto.

translation.en: Why? 'Cause I say so.
Plus, if the photos are from below, it'll look like we have double chins,
translation.es: Sin fotos desde abajo, porque no queremos que se vea la papada.

translation.en: which we don't want.
translation.es: porque no queremos que se vea la papada.

translation.en: Just like this. Click, click, click.
Okay, fine. He can be short and handsome, but he's gonna need a ladder.
translation.es: Puede ser bajo y apuesto, pero necesitará una escalera.

translation.en: Olo!
Thank you. Grazie.
And then I'll plop my bare ass right on the cake.
translation.es: Y después pongo el culo en la torta.

translation.en: Shit, you're not listening to me.
I am listening.
What kind of photographer do I want?
One with his ass in the cake.
translation.es: Uno con el culo en la torta.

translation.en: You're unbelievable! I can't believe you!
Massimo, let's go.
I'll catch up with you later.
- Fuck society - On your knees.
- Morning. - Ma'am!
- Not now. - Ma'am!
I didn't know you were coming early today.
translation.es: No sabía que vendrías temprano hoy.

translation.en: Apparently.
My new muse.
I guess I'll have benefits from it, yeah?
Did you see the email? Go on, read it!
We're going to Portugal!
Hey, girls, it's only 9:00 a.m., and you're already drunk.
translation.es: Hasta ahora son las 9:00 a. m. y ya están ebrias.

translation.en: Um, yeah, because we're going to Lagos Fashion Fair.
translation.es: Sí, porque vamos a la Feria de la Moda de Lagos.

translation.en: - Uh, for the fashion fair. - Yes.
translation.es: - A la Feria de la Moda. - Sí.

translation.en: Oh, that's wonderful.
Look.
- Congratulations. - Thank you.
Sorry, sorry. Oh.
I'm here.
Sorry, I couldn't leave amore mio with a hard- on.
translation.es: No podía dejar a mi amor con la verga parada.

translation.en: And now… what happens in Lagos stays in Lagos!
translation.es: Y ahora, lo que pasa en Lagos, se queda en Lagos.

translation.en: - They were in the villa the entire time? - The whole day, why?
translation.es: - ¿Estuvieron en la casa todo el tiempo? - Sí. ¿Por?

translation.en: He didn't even come to say goodbye?
I don't think we can fix this.
translation.es: Creo que esto no tiene arreglo.

translation.en: How much longer?
Nailed it.
You're such a drunk.
Are you trying to fucking scare me to death?
What are you wearing?
You're going out drinking with me in this?
Olo, I'm exhausted! We've got a big meeting tomorrow. I want to rest.
translation.es: Estoy cansada. Quiero descansar para la cita importante de mañana.

translation.en: I can't believe you!
- Weren't you the one talking about change? - Watch me.
translation.es: - ¿Quién me dijo que había cambiado? - Mira lo que voy a hacer.

translation.en: - I'm back from the dead! - Look at me. I'm lying down.
translation.es: - Cambié. Volví a vivir. - Estoy acostada.

translation.en: - Wait, what was it you said? - I'm beginning to live.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo lo dijiste? - Estoy empezando a vivir.

translation.en: What a poet. Shame you don't practice what you preach.
translation.es: Parecías una poetisa. Pero no era en serio.

translation.en: - Get up! I'm not sitting around all day! - Ola, no!
- You have one minute! - You're crazy!
- The clock is ticking! Sixty! - Olo!
- Fifty- nine, fifty- eight… - Fifty- nine, fifty- eight…
Hey, the view's pretty good down here.
translation.es: Me parece que está lindo aquí.

translation.en: - Olo? - What?
Aren't you engaged?
I'm just looking.
His board's nice too.
translation.es: La tabla de surf también es linda.

translation.en: Hey, cocktails.
Thank you.
I don't get it.
How can you be that into messing up your hair in the waves?
translation.es: ¿Por qué molestarse porque el pelo se moje y se te arruine el peinado?

translation.en: - There's something primal about it. - What?
It's just you and the water.
translation.es: Son solo el agua y tú.

translation.en: What? You and the water?
What are you, a surfing guru? Have you ever even stood on a board?
translation.es: ¿Te crees gurú del surf? ¿Surfeaste alguna vez?

translation.en: - Yeah. - When?
- This one time. -
Except I spent most of my time in the water.
translation.es: Pero me la pasé en el agua.

translation.en: Why am I not surprised?
Now give it up for our champion, Marcelo Nacho Matos!
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, un aplauso para nuestro campeón, Marcelo Nacho Matos.

translation.en: What?
Olo, we have to go.
- Are you crazy? We just got here. - We have to leave now.
translation.es: - ¿Estás loca? Acabamos de llegar. - Debemos irnos.

translation.en: What's up with you?
That's him. Who?
- Nacho. - What nachos?
The guy who got me from the ball. He can't see me.
translation.es: Es el que me sacó del baile. No debe verme.

translation.en: - Here he comes. - What?
- Walking towards us. - Here?
No.
- Oh, wait, he is. - Let's go.
Shush.
- He's with some chick. - What chick?
- Blonde. Cute. Nice legs… - What?
She's pretty hot.
- That's his sister Amelia. - You met his sister?
- What about his mom? Grandma too? - Stop it.
translation.es: - ¿Y a su mamá y su abuela? - Basta.

translation.en: - Olo, I have to get out of here. - I'll shield you with my body.
translation.es: - Olga, debo irme. - Cállate. Te tapo para que no te vea.

translation.en: Go, now.
I love surfing, so, so much!
Go, quick.
Bravo! Whoo!
I don't fucking believe it!
Now tell me everything. I want every little detail.
Fuck…
Over here!
Where? Hey, Lari. Let's go to the bar.
One cold beer, served by a hot bartender, please.
translation.es: Una cerveza helada servida por un chico sexy, por favor.

translation.en: The best local beer for the gorgeous friend.
translation.es: La mejor cerveza para esta belleza.

translation.en: - Oh, thank you. - You're welcome.
Well, Olo, that beer goes really well with your dress.
translation.es: Esa cerveza te queda muy bien con el vestido, Olga.

translation.en: I've been classy for over an hour now. This is long overdue.
translation.es: He estado elegante una hora. Ya es suficiente.

translation.en: - One glass of champagne. - Sure.
Champagne, champagne.
So bougie!
- Enjoy. - Thank you.
Mrs. Torricelli!
Hi, I'm Maria. We wrote to each other. Nice to meet you.
translation.es: Soy Maria. Hablamos por e-mail. Mucho gusto.

translation.en: Uh, it's a pleasure. But please, call me Laura.
Okay, Laura.
I'll show you around and introduce you to a few people.
translation.es: Te mostraré el lugar y te presentaré.

translation.en: - Shall we? - Yeah, okay.
You coming?
What's up?
- Another beer, please. - Come, please.
translation.es: - Otra cerveza, por favor. - Acompáñeme, por favor.

translation.en: No! No, no! Please! Please!
Darling! Please!
Let go of me, for fuck's sake! What the hell is this?
translation.es: Suéltame de una puta vez. ¿Qué mierda pasa?

translation.en: Please!
Laura? You look amazing!
Oh my God, Amelia.
Oh my God. And that dress! Where is this from?
Um, it's from my new collection. Actually, the first one.
translation.es: Es de mi nueva colección, que es mi primera.

translation.en: No way.
When I'm gonna be back in shape, I'm gonna become your most faithful client, I swear.
translation.es: Cuando recupere mi figura, seré tu clienta fiel.

translation.en: - Girl, you rock it. - Thank you.
Look at this.
Oh yeah, that's nice.
I think you would look great in it.
Wow. Amazing.
It's beautiful.
Let's go.
Let go of me!
Mrs. Olga, please stop.
Vittorio, listen. I'll go to my room by my own.
translation.es: Vittorio, presta atención. Me iré sola a mi habitación.

translation.en: Mrs. Torricelli told me to lock you in your room.
translation.es: La Sra. Torricelli me dijo que la encerrara.

translation.en: What? That rat!
Go.  Mrs. Tortellini can kiss my ass!
translation.es: - Entre. - ¡Ella se puede ir a la mierda!

translation.en: Stay here!
Fuck!
I'm glad to see you in good shape. I was really worried about you.
translation.es: Me alegra verte bien. Estaba muy preocupada por ti.

translation.en: But you know, not only me.
You know, my brother was like a shadow of a man.
Laura, you know he's not a bad person, right?
translation.es: Sabes que no es una mala persona, ¿eh?

translation.en: He's just…
He's just loyal to his father.
translation.es: Solo es leal a su padre.

translation.en: It doesn't justify the way he treated me.
translation.es: Eso no justifica cómo me trató.

translation.en: I know. And when I found out what he had done, I didn't talk to him, like, for a week.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Cuando supe lo que pasó, no le hablé una semana.

translation.en: I know he hurt you deeply.
But believe me, he has learned a very painful lesson.
translation.es: Pero créeme. Aprendió una lección muy dolorosa.

translation.en: Hear him out at least.
- Shut up! What are you doing? - Oh! I want to sleep!
Hello, my dear friend! Do you have a local beer?
Shut up! I want to sleep!
Fuck me.
Okay.
Some friend she is.
She's out there getting laid, and she locks me away in a hotel room.
translation.es: Ella se va a coger, y a mí me encierra en la habitación.

translation.en: Without a single drop of alcohol!
translation.es: Y sin una gota de alcohol.

translation.en: She'll pay for this.
There we go. There we go.
Fuck! No stairs.
Help!
Hello! Do you hear me? Can you help me, please?
Mrs. Olga, please! Back to your room! I must go to Mrs. Torricelli!
translation.es: Sra. Olga, vuelva a su cuarto. ¡Debo ir por la Sra. Torricelli!

translation.en: What is wrong with you? I want to go to the party right now!
translation.es: ¿Qué te pasa? ¡Quiero irme de fiesta ya mismo!

translation.en: Goddammit!
How could you do this to me?
Everything was so perfect until you showed up.
translation.es: Todo era perfecto hasta que apareciste.

translation.en: - I'm crying to the stars - I think I'm in love with you.
translation.es: Creo que me enamoré de ti.

translation.en: Don't say anything.
I don't live here.
It was a mistake.
But we can fix it.
Make yourself at home.
Nothing special.
I know.
Come…
I wanna show you something.
You can run away from me…
but you can't run away from what you feel.
translation.es: pero no de lo que sientes.

translation.en: How do you know what I feel?
Your body is a worse liar than you are.
translation.es: Tu cuerpo sabe mentir menos que tú.

translation.en: I need to go back to the hotel.
I will drive you.
You've already lost your way once.
translation.es: Ya metiste la pata una vez.

translation.en: Nacho…
I need time.
I will give you time, Little Bee.
I'll be waiting.
Even for the rest of my life.
translation.es: Incluso por el resto de mi vida.

translation.en: Maybe you will have to wait forever.
It won't change anything.
My purse.
Are you sure?
Laura…
You think that I want only--
I will love you.
I will protect you.
I will never hurt you.
I wanna see.
What do you wanna see?
Exactly this.
I want to watch it forever.
You're worried.
For sure, Massimo got mad because he wasn't able to track me.
translation.es: Seguro que Massimo se enfadó porque no sabía dónde estaba.

translation.en: If you don't want to, you don't have to go back.
translation.es: Si no quieres, no tienes que volver.

translation.en: It would be the easiest way. But at this moment, I--
translation.es: Sería lo más fácil, pero en este momento…

translation.en: Laura.
I'm not like him.
I won't force you to do anything.
translation.es: No te forzaré a hacer nada.

translation.en: You will always have a choice.
That's why I saved his life.
translation.es: Por eso le salvé la vida.

translation.en: What did you say?
- He hasn't told you… - Told me what?
When Anna shot you instead of Massimo, she tried to shoot him again.
translation.es: Cuando Anna te disparó en vez de a él, intentó dispararle de nuevo.

translation.en: I didn't allow it. I killed her.
So you saved Massimo's life.
translation.es: Le salvaste la vida a Massimo.

translation.en: Why?
Because you love him.
Laura…
I don't want my happiness at the cost of your suffering.
translation.es: No quiero que mi felicidad te cause sufrimiento.

translation.en: I want you to want me.
It would be easier for you.
Bee, you don't have to be with me because you don't have another choice.
translation.es: Hermosa, no tienes que estar conmigo por falta de alternativas.

translation.en: I want you to choose life with me.
translation.es: Debes elegir pasar la vida conmigo.

translation.en: I will wait for you… until you're ready.
translation.es: Te esperaré hasta que estés lista.

translation.en: Where have you been?
At the banquet.
After the banquet?
I went for a walk, to think.
translation.es: Fui a dar un paseo para pensar.

translation.en: For a walk?
To think?
You…
dirty…
liar!
Massimo…
I'm one step away from asking you for a divorce.
translation.es: Casi llego al punto de pedirte el divorcio.

translation.en: Divorce?
What is this? New?
Who did you talk to?
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. I'm talking to you. I'm talking to you.
When I got shot, our relationship almost died with me.
translation.es: Cuando me dispararon, nuestra relación casi muere conmigo.

translation.en: I was trying to save it, and you, you were speculating
translation.es: Yo intentaba salvarla, pero tú especulabas,

translation.en: and diving into your dark limbo, which I was not allowed to enter.
Now I'm in my own limbo.
translation.es: Ahora soy yo la que se ensimisma.

translation.en: I don't know what I want, but I'm alone there.
translation.es: No sé lo que quiero, pero debo estar sola.

translation.en: And I need space to find out what I feel.
translation.es: Necesito espacio para descubrir qué siento.

translation.en: Can you stop?
Stop!
Look at you.
Look at me.
There's no us.
This white shit has replaced me.
I'm going to leave it.
I'm going to sleep in Olga's room tonight.
translation.es: Esta noche dormiré en el cuarto de Olga.

translation.en: And I expect you to leave for Sicily tomorrow
translation.es: Espero que te vayas a Sicilia mañana

translation.en: to give me the time and space I need.
translation.es: para darme el espacio y tiempo que necesito.

translation.en: And do not think of following me.
Laura!
Fuck!
I return to Sicily.
The plane is to your disposal.
translation.es: Tienes el avión a tu disposición.

translation.en: Well played.
You managed to lock this tiger in a cage.
translation.es: Metiste a un tigre en una jaula.

translation.en: Fucking hell.
Have you completely lost your fucking mind?
You've gone crazy for some dick you hardly know
just because he makes you wet?
What now, Lari? Hmm?
Well? Are you going to break up your marriage and family for him?
translation.es: ¿Vas a destruir tu matrimonio, tu familia, por él?

translation.en: I can't believe it.
You haven't married Domenico yet,
translation.es: Aún no te casas con Domenico

translation.en: and you're already acting like a Torricelli.
translation.es: y ya te portas como una Torricelli.

translation.en: Spare me the bullshit about family loyalty.
translation.es: No me menciones la estupidez de la lealtad a la familia.

translation.en: What am I supposed to do?
Wait until Massimo deals with his shit and remembers I'm his wife?
translation.es: ¿Esperar a que Massimo recupere la compostura y se acuerde de mí?

translation.en: Who are you looking out for? Me or yourself?
translation.es: ¿Piensas en lo mejor para ti o para mí?

translation.en: Just leave me alone.
I have to figure out what I really want.
translation.es: Debo descubrir qué quiero de verdad.

translation.en: You're right.
I'm sorry I didn't ask how you're feeling, or if you need anything.
translation.es: Disculpa. No te pregunté cómo te sientes o si necesitas algo.

translation.en: Lari, look at me.
Look at me.
I love you.
I want you to be happy.
Whatever you decide, I'll support you. You hear me?
translation.es: Te apoyo en lo que decidas, ¿bueno?

translation.en: I'm just worried.
Come here.
Watch out for my snot.
Remember, just say the word, and I'll fucking kill both of them.
translation.es: Si me lo pides, mato a ambos.

translation.en: And I'll find you a nice, calm guy from a village near Radom, okay?
translation.es: Y te consigo un tipo calmado y amable de un pueblo cerca de Radom, ¿está bien?

translation.en: - That's right. - What?
You'll grow old and die of boredom.
Honey?
Hi, Dad.
Hi, sweetie!
I've missed riding with you.
translation.es: Echaba de menos nuestros paseos en moto.

translation.en: Jesus, Laura, did something happen?
You came here on a motorcycle?
You're gonna give me a heart attack.
translation.es: Vas a hacer que me dé un infarto.

translation.en: You know how much I hate your escapades.
Happy to see you too, Mom.
Come in. I've got some pork chops.
Of course, you never call ahead.
You could have told me you were coming.
I would have prepared.
I always have to think on my feet.
Honey, what's going on?
What do you mean? Nothing's going on. I'm just here to visit you.
translation.es: ¿Qué quieres decir? No pasa nada. Vine a visitarlos.

translation.en: Your mom is convinced that people buy motorcycles
translation.es: Tu mamá está convencida de que comprar motos

translation.en: when they're going through some kind of crisis.
translation.es: indica que la gente pasa por una crisis.

translation.en: Honey, you'll be 30 soon.
translation.es: Cariño, vas a cumplir 30 años pronto.

translation.en: If you were okay, you'd be spending your birthday with your husband,
translation.es: Si todo estuviera bien, pasarías tu cumpleaños con tu marido

translation.en: celebrating the anniversary of your first meeting.
translation.es: y celebrarían que se conocieron hace un año.

translation.en: - As far as I know-- - I'm in love with someone else.
translation.es: - Me parece… - Creo que me enamoré, mamá.

translation.en: His name is Nacho.
Honey, get me a cigarette.
But we agreed that we wouldn't smoke anymore.
Please, bring me a cigarette!
All right then.
Honey, if you weren't married to Massimo, who would you choose?
translation.es: Cariño, ¿a quién elegirías si no estuvieras casada con Massimo?

translation.en: The problem is, I don't know.
translation.es: El problema es que no lo sé.

translation.en: When you have the answer, you'll know what to do.
translation.es: Sabrás qué hacer cuando sepas la respuesta.

translation.en: All right…
I'll tell you a little secret.
translation.es: Te voy a contar un secreto

translation.en: I think it's what's kept our marriage alive for 35 years.
translation.es: que ha ayudado a nuestro matrimonio durante 36 años.

translation.en: Remember, a woman must be selfish in a relationship.
translation.es: Recuerda que una mujer debe ser egoísta en una relación.

translation.en: If you put your own happiness first,
you'll do whatever it takes to make it last, right?
translation.es: harás lo que sea para que dure.

translation.en: You will cherish your relationship.
But it can't be a relationship that destroys you.
translation.es: Pero debe ser una relación que no te destruya.

translation.en: Remember that a woman who lives only for her man
translation.es: Recuerda que una mujer que solo vive para su marido

translation.en: will always be unhappy.
Yeah.
And her man will be unhappy too.
translation.es: Y su marido también será infeliz.

translation.en: Thanks.
Ah, my coffee.
Okay. No lid for me.
translation.es: Bien. No me le ponga tapa.

translation.en: Thank you very much.
Thanks. Bye.
Coffee for Dad. And for his daughter?
translation.es: Un café para papá y esto para mi hija.

translation.en: - Lemonade. - Lemonade.
Sometimes I wish I was still that little girl you used to take out for lemonade.
translation.es: A veces quiero ser la niñita a la que llevabas a tomar limonada.

translation.en: You'll always be my little girl.
translation.es: Siempre serás esa niñita para mí.

translation.en: I like spending time with you
because I can eat as much as I want and not feel guilty.
translation.es: porque puedo comer sin sentirme culpable.

translation.en: Yeah.
It's different with Mom. - I've noticed. - Hmm.
translation.es: - Con mamá es distinto. - Ya lo sé.

translation.en: There are two things you never point out to a woman.
translation.es: Hay dos cosas que jamás les dices a las mujeres.

translation.en: What things?
Her age and the amount of food she eats.
I never knew about the second one.
- You should. - Okay, I'll keep that in mind.
translation.es: - Deberías saberla. - La tendré en cuenta.

translation.en: Excuse me.
- Just a second. Olga won't stop calling. - Okay.
How's everything?
- Good, thanks. - Great.
Hello. Answer my calls, or I'll have a heart attack.
translation.es: Hola. Si no contestas, me va a dar un infarto.

translation.en: Jeez, Olo, relax. What's up?
You want to know what's up?
Massimo knows about everything, Lari. He knows about you and Nacho!
translation.es: Massimo lo sabe todo. Sabe de lo tuyo con Nacho.

translation.en: He's gonna kill you, me, and God knows who else!
translation.es: Nos matará a las dos y quién sabe a quién más.

translation.en: Um, he told you that?
No, I overheard him talking to Domenico.
translation.es: No, lo escuché hablando con Domenico.

translation.en: Um, how did you know what they were talking about?
You don't speak Italian.  Maybe you don't.
translation.es: - No hablas italiano. - Tú eres la que no habla.

translation.en: But I was pissed off about not understanding, so I learned.
translation.es: Aprendí porque me harté de no entender.

translation.en: Maybe I'm not a fluent speaker, but I understand everything.
translation.es: No hablo bien, pero lo entiendo todo.

translation.en: You know how to say, Nacho fucked Laura?
translation.es: ¿Sabes decir Nacho se cogió a Laura?

translation.en: Nacho ha scopato Laura.
I guess it's time to go back to Sicily.
translation.es: Llegó el momento de volver a Sicilia.

translation.en: Are you fucking insane? He knows! Shoot! Fuck knows what he's gonna do!
translation.es: ¿Te volviste loca, mierda? Lo sabe. Es un tiro al aire. Es imprevisible.

translation.en: Fuck. I just said, shoot.
translation.es: Puta madre, dije tiro al aire.

translation.en: I'd rather him shoot himself than you or me.
translation.es: Ojalá se pegara un tiro en vez de matarnos.

translation.en: Olo, stop. There must be a reason he hasn't done anything about it yet.
translation.es: Olga, basta. Por algún motivo, no ha hecho nada.

translation.en: Are you even listening to me? Massimo won't forgive cheating.
translation.es: ¿No me entiendes? Massimo no perdonará la infidelidad.

translation.en: - Listen. - Shit.
I'm not scared of my own husband. I won't hide from him.
translation.es: No le tengo miedo a mi marido. No me esconderé de él.

translation.en: I'm coming back.
Do what you want. I'm working on… an escape plan.
translation.es: Haz lo que quieras. Yo preparo un plan de escape.

translation.en: Olo, relax. Have a cigarette, okay?
What the hell do you think I'm doing? I can't stop smoking!
translation.es: ¿Qué crees que hago? Estoy fumando como una chimenea.

translation.en: Okay, bye.
Dad, I have to go back to Sicily.
Okay.
But first, let's go back to the table. I ordered some apple pie.
translation.es: Primero volvamos a la mesa porque pedí tarta de manzana.

translation.en: Come on.
English, please.
translation.es: - Dove desidera andare? - Habla en español.

translation.en: Mr. Fabio Rossi,
what did you not understand when I told you not to push me?
translation.es: le dije que no me colmara la paciencia.

translation.en: Laura…
by coming here, I'm risking my life and also my father's life in business.
translation.es: Al venir, arriesgo mi vida y el negocio de mi papá.

translation.en: We have a pact with Massimo not to enter his territory.
translation.es: Acordamos con Massimo no entrar en su territorio.

translation.en: And you know what?
I didn't give a fuck…
because I needed to see you.
Bee…
Please.
Hear me out, and then do what you want.
translation.es: Escúchame y luego haz lo que quieras.

translation.en: As you always do.
Okay, Mr. Fabio Rossi. Let's go.
translation.es: Está bien, señor Fabio Rossi. En marcha.

translation.en: You know the address. You used to work there as a gardener.
translation.es: Sabes adónde. Trabajabas de jardinero ahí.

translation.en: I've already apologized for that.
I will do it again.
You wanted to tell me something.
Okay.
I want to be honest with you.
Since I met you…
I understand what it means to be best friends with your lover.
translation.es: entendí qué es ser el mejor amigo de tu amante.

translation.en: I didn't fall in love with you at first sight.
translation.es: No fue amor a primera vista.

translation.en: I came to like you first.
For the way you get angry…
translation.es: Por la forma en que te enfadas.

translation.en: the way you squint your eyes.
For being so stubborn.
I love looking at you.
When you sleep.
When you smile without a reason.
When you brush your teeth…
and raise one leg.
I want it all, Laura.
I wanna discover new things with you. I wanna show you the sunrise in Burma.
translation.es: Quiero descubrir cosas contigo. Quiero mostrarte el amanecer en Birmania.

translation.en: I wanna meditate with you in Bali.
And get drunk with you in Tokyo.
I know it sounds silly, but…
I have no idea when you became my world, Laura.
translation.es: pero no sé cuándo te volviste mi mundo, Laura.

translation.en: I can't help it.
I can't live without this world, and I don't want to.
translation.es: No puedo vivir sin ese mundo. Y no quiero hacerlo.

translation.en: I don't know how to convince you.
I'm ready to give you everything.
Whatever you want from me.
Thank you for finding the courage to tell me all of this.
translation.es: Gracias por tener el valor de decírmelo.

translation.en: I know it wasn't easy.
But I also need to speak with Massimo.
I can't stay in that situation anymore.
translation.es: No puedo seguir en esa situación.

translation.en: Nacho…
I need more time.
I will wait.
You're here!
Okay. I packed just one suitcase.
I grabbed your stuff too. It'll be a quick escape.
translation.es: Alisté tus cosas. Será un escape rápido.

translation.en: Why the fuck didn't you call or text?
I would've sent a driver for you.
My driver was really nice.
translation.es: Olga, el chofer era muy amable.

translation.en: Are you serious? Now's not the best time-- Fuck.
translation.es: ¿En serio? No es el mejor momento. ¡Puta madre!

translation.en: Are you fucking crazy?
Have you forgotten your husband's line of work?
translation.es: ¿Olvidaste a qué se dedica tu esposo?

translation.en: Why don't you bring him with you,
translation.es: ¿Por qué no lo invitas a pasar?

translation.en: and I'll look up how to send a dead body back to Poland?
translation.es: Averiguaré cómo llevar un cadáver a Polonia.

translation.en: Happy birthday.
God, it's so sad. You're going to die on your birthday.
Happy birthday, Lari!
If you survive, I bought you a really nice bag. If something happens, I'll keep it.
translation.es: Si sobrevives, te compré un bolso. Si te pasa algo, me lo quedo.

translation.en: - Olo… - Yeah?
Where's Massimo?
He went to the beach.
- Okay, I'll go find him. - Really?
We need to work things out.
And when I get back, we'll drink to my resurrection, okay?
translation.es: Cuando regrese, brindaremos por mi resurrección.

translation.en: - I have to go now. - Yeah.
- Olo… - Yeah?
- I'm doing this alone. - Oh yeah, alone. I'll stay here and wait.
translation.es: - Voy sola. - Claro. Te espero aquí.

translation.en: Fuck…
I'll just sit and wait.
Lari will be okay on her own.
Massimo…
We need to talk.
Let me start.
This conversation will be much more difficult for me.
translation.es: Esta conversación será más difícil para mí.

translation.en: - Massimo-- - Wait.
I have to say it all now.
Otherwise, I'm afraid I'm never gonna be able to say it again.
translation.es: De lo contrario, quizás no pueda volver a decirlo.

translation.en: That time changed my life.
translation.es: Esa época me cambió la vida.

translation.en: Not only because I had you,
but also because I realized what I really want for myself.
translation.es: sino porque me di cuenta de lo que quería.

translation.en: I thought I could…
I didn't want to be bad.
I can't forgive myself
that you didn't feel to come to me anymore after losing our baby.
translation.es: Que no acudieras a mí tras perder a nuestro bebé.

translation.en: That you had to deal with it all alone,
translation.es: Que tuvieras que pasar por eso sola.

translation.en: it has destroyed me…
you…
us.
So you knew everything about Nacho for a long time, didn't you?
translation.es: Sabías lo de Nacho desde hace mucho, ¿no?

translation.en: Why didn't you do anything?
When I was a child, my dad used to read me a book.
translation.es: Cuando chico, mi papá me leía un libro.

translation.en: I still remember one sentence, a little parable.
translation.es: Aún recuerdo una frase, una parábola.

translation.en: I didn't really understand it back then.
translation.es: En ese entonces, no la entendía.

translation.en: But now I do.
If you really love something…
just let it go.
If it comes back, it's yours forever.
translation.es: Si regresa, es tuyo para siempre.

translation.en: If it doesn't…
it was never meant to be.
Your dad was a wonderful father.
translation.es: Tu papá era un gran padre.

translation.en: And you also will be, one day.
translation.es: Tú también lo serás un día.

translation.en: Are you back, baby girl?
Subtitle translation by: Maja Konkolewska and Meredith Cannella
